title: Pull Me Apart
text:
[Perse]

Never have I felt so used
Give it up, give it up
I’m not enough
Never have I felt this used
Bring it down, bring it down
Hold it up

Everyone acting out my own desires
Everyone yelling
Legally I could behave the same way
No, no, please don’t pull me apart

I’m lost in loyalty
I’m lost

In rage!!

Look at me, behaving the same way
No, no, I’m pulling myself apart
They know us too well
No, no, we’re pulling ourselves apart
They know us too well
